name: 查尔斯·梅西
introduction: Charles Massey is an American actor / voiceover artist who was born and raised in New York City. He previously spent more than 35 years in Corporate America' financial industry (working for two Fortune 500 companies) before joining the entertainment industry in 2020. While working on the Emmy award winning "Godfather of Harlem" season 2 as the GeeChee Club' bartender, Charles obtained the necessary vouchers in order to join SAG-AFTRA in 2021. His favorite quote is "Don't say No to what you don't Know" and his hashtag is #corporatetocinema.
